title: 80/755/EEC: Commission Decision of 17 July 1980 authorizing the indelible printing of prescribed information on packages of cereal seed
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 17 July 1980  authorizing the indelible printing of prescribed information on packages of cereal seed  (80/755/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Member States shall notify the Commission of the conditions under which they make use of the authorization granted in Article 1. The Commission shall inform the other Member States thereof.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 July 1980.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No 125, 11.7.1966, p. 2309/66. (2)OJ No L 205, 13.8.1979, p. 1.
